title.rendered: Basement & Ground Triplex For Sale In Vasant Vihar

content.rendered:
This Ultra-modern looking basement ground triplex is located in one of the most sought-after locations in south Delhi. this stunning residence is set on a sprawling 4700sqft and features 4 dreamy bedrooms with attached stylish bathrooms, one powder room, and a spacious living-dining area with five-star specifications. The spacious imported modular kitchen in this premium apartment adds a feeling of light and space. this modern apartment offers a private lift, exclusive driveway, 2 stilt car parking exclusive gate, and servant quarters.

Vasant Vihar is arguably one of the most preferred Locations in south Delhi. the modern home is situated in a quiet location whilst being in close proximity to embassies, lavish hotels, hospitals, airports, and commercial hubs.

♕400 sqyds

♕park facing

♕4700 sqft

♕Basement Ground Triplex

♕Private Lift

♕Exclusive Driveway

♕2 Car Stilt Parking

♕4 Bedrooms With Attached Bathroom

♕Spacious Living Dining Area

♕Powder Room

♕Imported Modular Kitchen

♕Five Star Specifications

♕Premium Apartment

♕Renowned Builder

♕Immaculate Interiors

♕Servant Quarters

♕Excellent Location

📞 Call On 9818312077 For Site Visit
Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
